pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data and Code Behind the Stories and Interactives at 'FiveThirtyEight' // Datasets and code published by the data journalism website 'FiveThirtyEight' available at https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data. Note that while we received guidance from editors at 'FiveThirtyEight', this package is not officially published by 'FiveThirtyEight'.
